title: Build on Record
tagline: A simple decision log for recording decisions, commitments, and outcomes over time.

honestFraming.whatItIs: A lightweight tool for capturing decisions and tracking what happens next. Designed to make progress and thinking visible, privately or in public.
honestFraming.whatItIsNot: Not a project management tool. Not trying to replace your existing workflowâ€”just adds a thin layer of accountability.

whoItsFor: Solo builders who want to document their journey
People who struggle to remember why they made certain decisions
Anyone who wants public accountability without the noise
whoItsNotFor: People who need complex project management
Those who prefer real-time social interaction

currentState: Core functionality is in development. Working on the decision logging interface and basic public sharing features.

experiments.title: Public decision logs
experiments.description: Testing whether making decisions public creates useful accountability
experiments.signalLookingFor: Do users return to update their logs? Do they share them?

seoDescription: Build on Record is a simple decision log for recording decisions, commitments, and outcomes over time. Make your progress visible.
